Name: TrickRabbit
Notes: The bunny NPC that runs away from the player after talking to it. When the player catches it, it spawns a Power Star. This requires a properly configured Scenario entry.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on. The subpaths it moves on have to be linked to the main path using Path_ID. However, the control points of all paths will be ignored, meaning that the path segments are always linear.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.

SearchTurtle.Description: Red Koopa Shells and Gold Shells home in on this object.

MoveLimitCollision.Description: The object's collision binder also checks for MoveLimit collision.
